highlights.headline: Verhaeghe puts Panthers back in front
highlights.description: Carter Verhaeghe fires home a big-time goal to give the Panthers a lead late in the third period.

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Verhaeghe puts Panthers back in front) 2025/05/28 ESHEET

video.headline: Verhaeghe puts Panthers back in front

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Verhaeghe puts Panthers back in front) 2025/05/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Carter Verhaeghe broke a tie off a feed from Aleksander Barkov with 7:39 left and the defending champion Florida Panthers advanced to their third straight Stanley Cup Final, beating the Carolina Hurricanes 5-3 on Wednesday night in Game 5.
headlines.shortLinkText: Defending champion Panthers head back to Stanley Cup Final with 5-3 Game 5 win over Hurricanes
